title: What Can We Learn from the Jordan Peterson Phenomenon?
itunes:author: Alastair Roberts
dc:creator: Alastair Roberts
description: Jordan Peterson has a bestselling book and a fast-growing following, especially among young men. What should Christians learn from him?
